definitions.definition: to crush food into smaller, softer pieces with the teeth so that it can be swallowed:
examples: This meat is difficult to chew.

definitions.definition: to bite something with your teeth, usually in order to taste its flavour:
examples: Would you like some gum to chew?

definitions.definition: a piece of hard food that can be given to an animal to chew:
a hard sweet that gets softer the more you chew it
